card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Bolshack NEX
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card that has Lupia in its Card Name ■ This creature has "power attacker +1000" for each Fire Bird in your graveyard.

card.name: Bolgress Bazz, Matchless Dragon Machine
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Dragons from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Cerulean Dagger Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Dragons in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Terradragon Lightning Rhythm
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Hunters would be destroyed, put them into your mana zone instead.

card.name: Gaial Axel
card.text: ■ Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Messa Danjiri Dragon
card.text: ■ Your Unknown and Zenith creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Each of your Unknown in the battle zone gets "speed attacker".

card.name: Codename Balga Ragon
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Necrodragon Abayo Shabayo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Mendelssohn
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Chopin, Dragon King
card.text: ■ While you have a Dragon in the battle zone, this creature gets "Shield trigger". ■ Guardman ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and battle it with this creature.

card.name: Codeking Mozart
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-Dragons. ■ Your opponent's Dragons can't attack.

card.name: Mitsurugi Boost, Matchless Dragon Demon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put this creature into your mana zone. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Codename Valkyrie Ragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Dragon from your deck, show that Dragon to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Double Breaker
